verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> When I bring the sword <S%H2719><s%> on a land, <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from among <S%H7097><s%> them, <S%H5414><s%> and set him for their watchman; <S%H6822><s%>
if, <S%H7200><s%> when he sees the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on the land, <S%H776><s%> he blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and warn <S%H2094><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%>

then whoever <S%H8085><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and doesn't <S%H2094><s%> take warning, if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and take him away, <S%H3947><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on his own head. <S%H7218><s%>

He heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and didn't <S%H2094><s%> take warning; his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on him; <S%H2094><s%> whereas if he had taken warning, he would have delivered <S%H4422><s%> his soul. <S%H5315><s%>

But if the watchman <S%H6822><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and doesn't <S%H8628><s%> blow the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> aren't <S%H2094><s%> warned, and the sword <S%H2719><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> from among them; <S%H3947><s%> he is taken away in his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> at the watchman <S%H6822><s%>'s hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So you, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and give them warning from me. <S%H2094><s%>

When I tell <S%H559><s%> the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, <S%H4191><s%> you shall surely die, <S%H4191><s%> and you don't <S%H1696><s%> speak to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way; <S%H1870><s%> that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Nevertheless, <S%H2094><s%> if you warn the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from it, <S%H7725><s%> and he doesn't turn from his way; <S%H1870><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Thus you speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H2403><s%> are on us, <S%H4743><s%> and we pine away in them; <S%H2421><s%> how then can we live?

Tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H2416><s%> As I live, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3069><s%> I have no pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> but that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live: <S%H2421><s%> turn, <S%H7725><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways; <S%H1870><s%> for why will you die, <S%H4191><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not deliver <S%H5337><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his disobedience; <S%H6588><s%> and as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> he shall not fall <S%H3782><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness; <S%H7562><s%> neither shall he who is righteous <S%H6662><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he sins. <S%H2398><s%>

When I tell <S%H559><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> that he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live; <S%H2421><s%> if he trust <S%H982><s%> to his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> none of his righteous <S%H6666><s%> deeds shall be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> but in his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> therein shall he die. <S%H4191><s%>

Again, <S%H559><s%> when I say to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> You shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die; <S%H4191><s%> if he turn <S%H7725><s%> from his sin, <S%H2403><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right; <S%H6666><s%>

if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> give again <S%H7999><s%> that which he had taken by robbery, <S%H1500><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> committing <S%H6213><s%> no iniquity; <S%H5766><s%> he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live, <S%H2421><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

None of his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he has committed <S%H2398><s%> shall be remembered <S%H2142><s%> against him: <S%H6213><s%> he has done that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right; <S%H6666><s%> he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal: <S%H8505><s%> but as for them, <S%H1870><s%> their way is not equal. <S%H8505><s%>
When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> he shall even die therein. <S%H4191><s%>

When the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness, <S%H7564><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he shall live thereby. <S%H2421><s%>

Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> House <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> of you after his ways. <S%H1870><s%>

It happened in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity, <S%H1546><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, <S%H2568><s%> in the fifth day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that one who had escaped <S%H6412><s%> out of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, The city <S%H5892><s%> has been struck. <S%H5221><s%>

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had been on me in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> he who was escaped <S%H6412><s%> came; <S%H935><s%> and he had opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> until he came <S%H935><s%> to me in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened, <S%H6605><s%> and I was no more mute. <S%H481><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> they who inhabit <S%H3427><s%> those waste <S%H2723><s%> places in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> was one, <S%H259><s%> and he inherited <S%H3423><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> but we are many; <S%H7227><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> us for inheritance. <S%H4181><s%>

Therefore tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> You eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> to your idols, <S%H1544><s%> and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood: <S%H1818><s%> and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land? <S%H776><s%>

You stand <S%H5975><s%> on your sword, <S%H2719><s%> you work <S%H6213><s%> abomination, <S%H8441><s%> and every one <S%H376><s%> of you defiles <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife: <S%H802><s%> and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land? <S%H776><s%>

You shall tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> surely those who are in the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and him who is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the animals <S%H2416><s%> to be devoured; <S%H398><s%> and those who are in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and an astonishment; <S%H8077><s%> and the pride <S%H1347><s%> of her power <S%H5797><s%> shall cease; <S%H7673><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be desolate, <S%H8074><s%> so that none shall pass through. <S%H5674><s%>

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I have made <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%> and an astonishment, <S%H8077><s%> because of all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

As for you, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> of <S%H681><s%> you by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the houses, <S%H1004><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> one <S%H2297><s%> to another, <S%H259><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Please come <S%H935><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> what is the word <S%H1697><s%> that comes forth <S%H3318><s%> from Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

They come <S%H935><s%> to you as the people <S%H5971><s%> come, <S%H3996><s%> and they sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you as my people, <S%H5971><s%> and they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but don't <S%H6213><s%> do them; <S%H6310><s%> for with their mouth they show <S%H6213><s%> much love, <S%H5690><s%> but their heart <S%H3820><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gain. <S%H1215><s%>

Behold, <S%H5690><s%> you are to them as a very lovely song <S%H7892><s%> of one who has a pleasant <S%H3303><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and can play well <S%H2895><s%> on an instrument; <S%H5059><s%> for they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but they don't <S%H6213><s%> do them.
When this comes to pass, <S%H935><s%> (behold, <S%H935><s%> it comes), then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> has been among them. <S%H8432><s%>
